definition: to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: All exhibitors are welcome to take part in the International Competition and Awarding held by the organizer.
sentences.chinese: 所有參展方均可參與西安世園會國際競賽及評獎。

sentences.english: Sub-grade awards, which can greatly enhance the student's enthusiasm to learn English.
sentences.chinese: 分年級評獎，這樣可以大大提高學生學英語的積極性。

sentences.english: Nobel Committee, why not give one to Fritz Henderson?
sentences.chinese: 諾貝爾評獎委員會，爲什麼不給韓德勝發個獎呢？

sentences.english: What are the contents and mechanisms of Baldrige Award?
sentences.chinese: 波多裏奇獎的內容和評獎機制是什麼？

sentences.english: The presentation should align the project with ASQ's Team Excellence criteria.
sentences.chinese: 演講陳述需要與ASQ卓越團隊評獎標準相符合。

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
hard power (i.e. military and economic power)
Nanzi or Nantzu district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
